name: Project:Hunter
description:
Controls:

WASD: Move

Q: Change Weapon

G: Grenade (warning... I had a bit too much fun with it)

Space: Jump

Shift: Sprint

L-Ctrl: Crouch

You'll be able to modify all the controls later on.

Mechanics:

Wallrun: Just jump next to a wall, you'll automatically wallrun.

Climb: Hold the jump key when close to an ledge to climb it.

Slide: Sprint and then crouch.

The project is only like 3% done, there's a ton of work to be done.
